mapper.select: /* com.neofect.gts.services.sm.repository.AuthMenuRepository.HEADMENU */ SELECT 1 as menuLevel, A.SYS_ID as pgmCode, A.SYS_NAME as pgmName, A.SORT_ORDER as menuOrder FROM SM_AUTH_SYS A WHERE A.COMPANY_CODE = #{tmpCompanyCode} AND A.SYS_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT A.SYS_ID FROM SM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU A WHERE A.COMPANY_CODE = #{tmpCompanyCode} AND A.USER_GROUP_CODE IN ( SELECT B.USER_GROUP_CODE FROM SM_AUTH_GROUP_USERS B WHERE B.COMPANY_CODE = #{tmpCompanyCode} AND B.USER_ID = #{tmpStdCode} ) AND ( A.AUTH_I='Y' OR A.AUTH_R='Y' OR A.AUTH_D='Y' OR A.AUTH_P='Y' OR A.AUTH_E='Y' ) UNION SELECT DISTINCT A.SYS_ID FROM SM_AUTH_USER_MENU A WHERE A.COMPANY_CODE = #{tmpCompanyCode} AND A.USER_ID = #{tmpStdCode} AND ( A.AUTH_I='Y' OR A.AUTH_R='Y' OR A.AUTH_D='Y' OR A.AUTH_P='Y' OR A.AUTH_E='Y' ) ) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 4,2
